meanings.definition: A plant of the buttercup family with bright yellow flowers.
meanings.sent1: The kingcup bloomed beautifully in the garden.
meanings.sent2: I picked a kingcup to put in a vase on the table.
meanings.sent3: The bees buzzed happily around the kingcup, enjoying its nectar.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as bright as a kingcup in full bloom.
meanings.sent5: The field was a sea of golden kingcups, a breathtaking sight.

meanings.definition: A cup or goblet used by a king.
meanings.sent1: The king held the ornate kingcup during the ceremony.
meanings.sent2: The royal jeweler crafted a new kingcup for the coronation.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous prince filled the kingcup with jelly as a prank.
meanings.sent4: The king raised his kingcup in a toast to his subjects.
meanings.sent5: The kingcup gleamed with intricate designs fit for royalty.
